QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Using an incentive spirometer
QAPair.Answer: Your health care provider may recommend that you use an incentive spirometer after surgery or when you have a lung illness, such as pneumonia . The spirometer is a device used to help you keep your lungs healthy. Using the incentive spirometer helps you take slow deep breaths. It also may be used to help people with COPD exercise their lungs.
